content: निधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To place, put, put or set down; शिरसि निदधानोंजलिपुटं <ls>Bh. 3. 123</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 50</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">62</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 52</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 13.</ls> {@--2@} To confide, or entrust, commit to the care of; निदधे विजयाशंसां चापे सीतां व लक्ष्मणे <ls>R. 12. 44</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 36.</ls> {@--3@} To give, impart to, deposit with; दिनांते निहितं तेजः सवित्रेव हुताशनः <ls>R. 4. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To put down, lay, allay, restrain; सलिलैनिंहितं रजः क्षितौ <ls>Ghaṭ. 1.</ls> {@--5@} To bury, conceal or hide (as under ground), <ls>Ms. 5. 68.</ls> {@--6@} To fix or direct the thoughts upon; <ab>cf.</ab> निध्यै. {@--7@} To determine, resolve. {@--8@} To direct one's labours, endeavour. {@--9@} To appoint. {@--10@} To remove, relinquish. {@--11@} To lay up, treasure up. {@--12@} To remember, keep or bear in mind. {@--13@} To end, close.
निधा <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Laying snares. {@--2@} A net or snare.
